thread.title: Cheryl and Liam Payne announce birth of healthy baby boy
thread.title_full: Cheryl and Liam Payne announce birth of healthy baby boy

title: Cheryl and Liam Payne announce birth of healthy baby boy
text:
Published 25th March 2017 
The 33-year-old star shared the joyous news that she had given birth on Wednesday. 
In an Instagram post the A-lister published a pic to her 3.1million followers of her boyfriend Liam cradling their newborn. 
She said: "On Wednesday 22nd March Liam and I became parents to an incredibly beautiful, healthy baby boy, weighing 7lb 9 and looking like a dream. 
INSTAGRAM BABY BOY: Cheryl shared the news on Instagram Cheryl and Liam in pictures Tuesday, 29th November 2016 The speculation around the romance between One Direction's Liam Payne and X Factor judge Cheryl Fernandez-Versini has been huge – now the pair have finally confirmed they are dating we take a look at the pop star couple's relationship in pictures 1 / 22 
"Although he still doesn't have a name he is already stealing hearts." 
She added: "We are all madly in love and overwhelmingly happy with our little arrival. 
"Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers around the world. 
GETTY BESOTTED: The couple's son weighed 7lb 9 Cheryl's sexiest pictures A selection of pictures covering the highlights of Cheryl Cole's career. 1 / 93 “We are all madly in love” Cheryl 
"A day that now has a different meaning to me forever." 
And fans spammed the new mum with comments congratulating her on the birth. 
One person wrote: "Congratulations!! Loads of love for you and your family!" 
"Congrats to you and Liam! You two are gonna be amazing parents," said another. 
GETTY IN LOVE: Liam was confirmed to be dating Cheryl last year 
A third posted: "Wonderful congratulations to you both on the birth of your little boy. 
"Happy Mother's Day." 
The One Direction star said: "It's a very personal, precious time for us. I'm still learning. I'm only 23." Related videos
